original_text: And I will bring to an end in Moab, declares the Lord, him who offers sacrifice in the high place and makes offerings to his god.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이라 모압 산당에서 제사하며 그 신들에게 분향하는 자를 내가 끊어버리리라

sentences.original_text: And I will bring to an end in Moab
him who offers sacrifice in the high place
and makes offerings to his god
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 신에게 제물을 바치는 자
